short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visually inspect a list of websites or social media profiles in a snap.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visually inspect hundreds of websites or social media profiles in minutes, not hours. Click ❤️ if it's a match or ✖️ if it's not. Need to add a note? No problem. After you're finished export everything into a CSV file.
